name: Broken Link
description:
The homepage link is broken. The href attribute is malformed.

Task: Fix the anchor tag so it properly links to 'home.html'
hints: Look at the attribute name carefully. Is it spelled correctly?
The correct attribute for links is 'href', not 'hrf'

name: Unclosed Tag
description:
A paragraph tag is not properly closed, breaking the DOM structure.

Task: Add the missing closing tag
hints: The first paragraph is missing something at the end

Every opening

needs a closing

name: Comment Clue
description:
There's a hidden clue in an HTML comment that reveals the correct ID for the button.

Task: Set the button's ID to the value found in the comment
code:
<!-- The button ID should be: submit-btn -->
<button id="btn">Submit</button>
hints: HTML comments are written as <!-- comment -->
The comment tells you exactly what the ID should be

name: Nesting Nightmare
description:
The tags are incorrectly nested, violating HTML structure rules.

Task: Fix the nesting order
hints: Tags must close in the reverse order they were opened
Think: div opens first, so it should close last

name: ARIA Label Missing
description:
An icon button is not accessible because it lacks an aria-label.

Task: Add aria-label="Close" to the button
hints: Screen readers need text alternatives for icon buttons
Use the aria-label attribute to provide accessible text

name: Meta Mystery
description:
The page isn't mobile-responsive because the viewport meta tag is incorrect.

Task: Fix the viewport meta tag
hints: The width should be 'device-width', not just 'device'
Standard viewport: width=device-width, initial-scale=1

name: Form Action Error
description:
The form submits to the wrong endpoint. It should POST to '/api/submit'.

Task: Fix the form action and method
hints: The action needs '/api/' prefix and method should be POST
Forms for data submission typically use method="post"

name: Hidden Input
description:
There's a required hidden field missing from the form that should contain userId='12345'.

Task: Add the hidden input field
hints: Hidden inputs use type="hidden"
You need: <input type="hidden" name="userId" value="12345">

name: Table Header
description:
The table is using for headers instead of , breaking accessibility.

Task: Change the first row cells to use proper header tags
hints: Table headers should use <th> tags, not <td>
Replace the first row's <td> tags with <th>

name: Script Placement
description:
A script tag is in the trying to access DOM elements before they load.

Task: Add the 'defer' attribute to fix the timing issue
hints: Scripts in <head> run before the DOM is ready
The 'defer' attribute makes scripts wait for DOM to load

name: Image Alt Text
description:
An important image is missing alt text, making it inaccessible.

Task: Add appropriate alt text: 'Company logo'
hints: All images need alt attributes for accessibility
Use alt="Company logo"

name: Input Label Association
description:
A form input is not associated with its label.

Task: Add proper id and for attributes to connect them
hints: Labels need 'for' attribute matching input 'id'
Add id="email" to input and for="email" to label

name: Required Attribute
description:
A critical form field allows empty submission.

Task: Add the required attribute to the password input
hints: HTML5 has a 'required' attribute for form validation
Add 'required' to the input tag

name: Iframe Security
description:
An iframe lacks security attributes, creating a vulnerability.

Task: Add sandbox attribute to restrict iframe permissions
hints: Iframes should use the 'sandbox' attribute for security
Add sandbox="" to restrict all permissions by default

name: Doctype Declaration
description:
The HTML document is missing its DOCTYPE, causing quirks mode.

Task: Add the HTML5 DOCTYPE at the very beginning
hints: Every HTML document should start with DOCTYPE
HTML5 uses: <!DOCTYPE html>

name: Button Type
description:
A button inside a form unexpectedly submits the form.

Task: Add type="button" to prevent default submit behavior
hints: Buttons in forms default to type="submit"
Add type="button" to prevent form submission

name: Character Encoding
description:
Special characters display incorrectly due to missing charset.

Task: Add the UTF-8 meta charset tag in
hints: Character encoding should be declared in <head>
Use: <meta charset="UTF-8">

name: Semantic Structure
description:
The page uses generic divs instead of semantic HTML5 elements.

Task: Identify which semantic tag should replace

- choose from: header, nav, main, footer
hints: HTML5 semantic elements describe their purpose
The top section with site branding should use <header>
errorMessage: Think about what semantic tag best describes the page's top section with branding.
